Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

InsufficientPointsResponse.value: Insufficient points for requested wishes. Broke bitch.
InsufficientPointsResponse.label: Insufficient points response
InsufficientPointsResponse.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when a user has insufficient points for a wish.

EventFiveStar.label: Event 5 Star
EventFiveStar.tooltip: The event 5 star character. Format name as: <Name> (<Element>). ex. Xiao (Anemo)

EventFourStars.label: Event 4 Stars
EventFourStars.tooltip: A list of event 4 star characters, separated by commas. ex. Fischl (Electro), Sayu (Anemo), Xiangling (Pyro)

Cost.label: Wish Cost
Cost.tooltip: The number of channel points for a single wish

MaxWishes.label: Max Wishes
MaxWishes.tooltip: The maximum number of wishes a user can request in a single command

AdditionalFourStars.label: Additional 4 stars
AdditionalFourStars.tooltip: A list of additional four stars that have been released but may not be part of the pool, separated by commas. If the character is already in the pool, they will not be added twice.
